item.title: St. Cloud State wins the 2021 DII wrestling championship
item.description: St. Cloud State has won the 2021 DII Wrestling Championship in St. Louis, MO. The Huskies have won the last four out of five titles. Look back at all the excitement from the championship matches.

item.title: NCAA announces the 2020 NCAA wrestling award winners
item.description: The NCAA has released the winners and final standings for the 2020 NCAA wrestling awards in Divisions I, II and III.

item.description: Check out the latest standings for Most Dominant Wrestler, most falls and most tech falls in all three divisions across NCAA wrestling.

item.title: Pat Pecora's college wrestling win record by the numbers
item.description: Pat Pecora became college wrestling's all-time wins leader on Feb. 7, 2020. Let's take a look back at Pitt-Johnstown's legendary head coach's career by the numbers.

item.title: NCAA Most Dominant Wrestler Award standings unveiled
item.description: The NCAA has released updated standings for the 2020 NCAA Wrestling Awards that will be awarded in March at the respective Division I, II and III Wrestling Championships.

item.title: Pitt-Johnstown's Pecora becomes college wrestling's all-time winningest coach with win No. 617
item.description: Pitt-Johnstown wrestling Coach Pat Pecora earned his 617th career win and snapped a 46-year-old record to become college wrestling's all-time winningest coach when his fourth-ranked Mountain Cats dealt 11th-ranked Mercyhurst a 22-12 Alumni Night setback.

item.title: St. Cloud State wins the 2019 DII Wrestling Championship
item.description: St. Cloud State has won the 2019 DII Wrestling Championship, marking the Huskies 4th title in 5 years. Look back at all the excitement from the championship matches.

item.title: 2019 DII wrestling championships: St. Cloud State wins national title
item.description: St. Cloud State repeated as DII wrestling national champions at the 2019 championships.

item.title: Division II wrestling: 10 things to know for Cleveland
item.description: With the stage set for the DII NCAA wrestling championships in Cleveland, we put together some need-to-know quick hits on the tournament's top prospects.

item.title: College wrestling: DII and DIII regionals help shape award standings headed into NCAA championships
item.description: Division II and III wrestlers competed in their NCAA regional qualifying tournaments over the weekend to set the standings headed into the NCAA championships. These are the wrestling leading the Most Dominant Wrester, fall and tech fall standings across all three divisions.
